item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 30, 2025 at 3:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Jepsen: Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4 (294 points | 82 comments)
2. Chain of Recursive Thoughts: Make AI think harder by making it argue with itself (374 points | 180 comments)
3. I use zip bombs to protect my server (394 points | 199 comments)
4. Bamba: An open-source LLM that crosses a transformer with an SSM (134 points | 42 comments)
5. An illustrated guide to automatic sparse differentiation (25 points | 1 comment)
6. Everything we announced at our first LlamaCon (141 points | 72 comments)
7. Path Isn't Real on Linux (69 points | 48 comments)
8. Only Teslas exempt from new auto tariffs thanks to 85% domestic content rule (302 points | 286 comments)
9. It's School time: Adventures in hacking an old Kindle (88 points | 17 comments)
10. Performance optimization is hard because it's fundamentally a brute-force task (228 points | 97 comments)
11. Show HN: Beatsync – perfect audio sync across multiple devices (214 points | 53 comments)
12. Programming languages should have a tree traversal primitive (192 points | 143 comments)
13. ArkFlow: High-performance Rust stream processing engine (139 points | 29 comments)
14. Show HN: A Chrome extension that will auto-reject non-essential cookies (213 points | 127 comments)
15. Show HN: An MCP server for understanding AWS costs (40 points | 4 comments)

17. Modern Realty (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
18. Firefox tab groups are here (539 points | 316 comments)
19. WorldGen: Open-source 3D scene generator for Game/VR/XR (19 points | 1 comment)
20. O3 beats a master-level GeoGuessr player, even with fake EXIF data (380 points | 269 comments)
21. Finding paths of least action with gradient descent (2023) (37 points | 5 comments)
22. Waymo and Toyota outline partnership to advance autonomous driving deployment (334 points | 273 comments)
23. China's Clinical Trial Boom (123 points | 65 comments)
24. Show HN: An interactive demo of QR codes' error correction (64 points | 8 comments)
25. Show HN: AgenticSeek – Self-hosted alternative to cloud-based AI tools (72 points | 12 comments)
26. Indian court orders blocking of Proton Mail (306 points | 136 comments)
27. Princeton Engineering Anomalies Research (2010) (17 points | 1 comment)
28. LibreLingo – FOSS Alternative to Duolingo (691 points | 312 comments)
29. Show HN: Flowcode – Turing-complete visual programming platform (162 points | 67 comments)
30. The last masters of Afro-Colombian machete fencing (45 points | 16 comments)
